content.body:
> <@timothygu:matrix.org> SVG only shows up in some cases. PNG works everywhere.

content.body: Domenic: you should be able to navigate a nested context to a data: URL (there's an open PR by me on forbidding it for top-level contexts with some open questions)
content.formatted_body: Domenic: you should be able to navigate a nested context to a data: URL (there's an open PR by me on forbidding it for top-level contexts with some open questions)

content.body: (I changed the avatar to a PNG)
fwf, i know for a fact svgs work since that is what i used for my own room
no clue if there are attributes missing on y'alls (perhaps a case of over-optimization)
I don't know why it works on mozilla.org though, since it also seems to use Synapse
